name: Continuous Delivery Open Platform
body:
### Welcome to the Continuous Delivery Open Platform
This platform provides a complete working solution for Continuous Delivery using industry-standard open source tools such as Jenkins, Puppet, Chef, Capistrano, Maven, git, Java, Grails, etc. 

If you have any questions, email us at elasticops@stelligent.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
